transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: what are the Warriors on my battery warranties on my batteries

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Battery warranties cover manufacturing defects for 12 months or up to 5,000 km, whichever comes first, and include free repairs or replacements at any Battery Smart service centre. Let me know if you need a claim.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: I need a claim for my warranty

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Sure! Open the Battery Smart app, tap “Warranty Claim,” upload your purchase receipt and battery ID, then drop the battery at the nearest service centre for free replacement.

transcript.speaker: customer
transcript.text: where is the real service centre

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Open the Battery Smart app, go to “Find Service Centre,” and it will show the nearest location with address, map and live hours. All our swap stations double as service centres.

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: what are the Warriors on my battery warranties on my batteries

Agent: Battery warranties cover manufacturing defects for 12 months or up to 5,000 km, whichever comes first, and include free repairs or replacements at any Battery Smart service centre. Let me know if you need a claim.

Customer: I need a claim for my warranty

Agent: Sure! Open the Battery Smart app, tap “Warranty Claim,” upload your purchase receipt and battery ID, then drop the battery at the nearest service centre for free replacement.

Customer: where is the real service centre

Agent: Open the Battery Smart app, go to “Find Service Centre,” and it will show the nearest location with address, map and live hours. All our swap stations double as service centres.
